titles.title: Providing for the consideration of the bill (H. R. 1259) to direct the Secretary of Homeland Security to continue to implement the Migrant Protection Protocols, and for other purposes.
Providing for the consideration of the bill (H. R. 1259) to direct the Secretary of Homeland Security to continue to implement the Migrant Protection Protocols, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.
Motion to Discharge Committee filed by Mr. Biggs. Petition No: 117-6.

bill.summary: This resolution provides for consideration of H.R. 1259 (requiring the Department of Homeland Security to implement the Migrant Protection Protocols).
